## ThemeLoader.isThemeLoaded() method

Checks if `theme` instance is completely loaded, meaning that `extends` property is resolved.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static isThemeLoaded(theme: Theme | FlatTheme): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  theme | [Theme](./harp-datasource-protocol.theme.md) \| FlatTheme |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
